name: Dark Experiment
description:
Dark Experiment

These dark and terrible experiments were conducted in this dungeon in ancient times. No one was sure exactly what was being done, but there was talk of people suffering or losing their lives. The manager of the dungeon had suddenly decided to close the place for no apparent reason. Years passed, and people had forgotten about the dungeon.

But a group of researchers decided to go there to solve the mystery in this dungeon. They began to collect documents about the experiments in it, and they found a mysterious set of documents in the dungeon. The documents showed what the experiments were and why they were conducted. But the researchers had no idea what to do. Obviously, the documents were creepy and dark, and the investigators did not know what to do.

The best thing was to pack all the documents and get out of here..

Average playtime: 15 minutes Controls: 
  • Move: W-S-A-D
  • Interaction: E
